# task_progress RECOMMENDED

When starting a new task, it is recommended to include a todo list using the task_progress parameter.


1. Include a todo list using the task_progress parameter in your next tool call
2. Create a comprehensive checklist of all steps needed
3. Use markdown format: - [ ] for incomplete, - [x] for complete

**Benefits of creating a todo/task_progress list now:**
	- Clear roadmap for implementation
	- Progress tracking throughout the task
	- Nothing gets forgotten or missed
	- Users can see, monitor, and edit the plan

**Example structure:**```
- [ ] Analyze requirements
- [ ] Set up necessary files
- [ ] Implement main functionality
- [ ] Handle edge cases
- [ ] Test the implementation
- [ ] Verify results```

Keeping the task_progress list updated helps track progress and ensures nothing is missed.

This session is being continued from a previous conversation that ran out of context. The conversation is summarized below:
1. Primary Request and Intent:
   User wants to create UI in Unity for the MonsterHunter project. The original request was in Chinese: "在Unity里面创建Ui" (Create UI in Unity). No specific UI type, functionality, or placement was specified. Based on the action game nature of the project, I inferred that a basic game HUD (Heads-Up Display) would be appropriate, including health bar, stamina bar, and skill indicators.

2. Key Technical Concepts:
   - Unity UI (UGUI) system for Unity 2020.3+
   - MonsterHunter project - Unity action game with custom ActionMachine system for managing character actions
   - Game HUD components (health bar, stamina bar, skill indicators)
   - UI Canvas and UI components
   - C# scripting for UI management and updates

3. Files and Code Sections:
   - Assets/_Game/Scripts/ - Main scripts directory
      - Contains three subdirectories: ActionMachine/, LocalModels/, and Runtime/
      - Plan to create a new UI/ subdirectory here for UI-related scripts
   
4. Problem Solving:
   - Attempted to use coplay-mcp server to list game objects in hierarchy, but the server connection failed
   - Switched approach to creating UI components via C# scripts instead of using MCP tools
   - Decided on creating a basic game HUD as a reasonable starting point for an action game UI

5. Pending Tasks:
   - Create UI scripts directory under Assets/_Game/Scripts/
   - Create UIManager script to control the HUD
   - Create HealthBarUI component script
   - Create StaminaBarUI component script
   - Create skill/attack indicator UI components
   - Create UI prefab in Unity
   - Position and style UI elements
   - Test UI functionality in Unity

6. Current Work:
   Just executed list_files on Assets/_Game/Scripts/ directory and discovered it contains:
   - ActionMachine.meta and ActionMachine/
   - LocalModels.meta and LocalModels/
   - Runtime.meta and Runtime/
   
   Was about to create a new UI subdirectory and begin implementing the game HUD system with C# scripts.

7. Next Step:
   Create a UI subdirectory under Assets/_Game/Scripts/ and then create the UI manager script along with component scripts for health bar, stamina bar, and skill indicators. User's exact words from the task context: "在Unity里面创建Ui" (Create UI in Unity).

8. Required Files:
   - Assets/_Game/Scripts/ (directory to create UI subfolder in).

Please continue the conversation from where we left it off without asking the user any further questions. Continue with the last task that you were asked to work on. Pay special attention to the most recent user message when responding rather than the initial task message, if applicable.
If the most recent user's message starts with "/newtask", "/smol", "/compact", "/newrule", or "/reportbug", you should indicate to the user that they will need to run this command again.

I'll start by creating the directory structure and the UIManager script.","signature":"","summary":[]},{"type":"text","text":"I'll continue creating the UI system for the MonsterHunter project. Let me start by creating the UI scripts directory and implementing the game HUD components.

<write_to_file>
<path>Assets/_Game/Scripts/UI/UIManager.cs</path>
<content>using UnityEngine;
using UnityEngine.UI;

namespace NBC.ActionMachine.UI
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Main UI manager for the game HUD
    /// Manages health bar, stamina bar, and skill indicators
    /// </summary>
    public class UIManager : MonoBehaviour
    {
        [Header("UI References")]
        [SerializeField] private HealthBarUI _healthBar;
        [SerializeField] private StaminaBarUI _staminaBar;
        [SerializeField] private SkillIndicatorUI _skillIndicator;

        [Header("Player Reference")]
        [SerializeField] private ActionController _playerController;

        private void Awake()
        {
            if (_healthBar == null)
                Debug.LogWarning("HealthBarUI reference not set in UIManager");
            
            if (_staminaBar == null)
                Debug.LogWarning("StaminaBarUI reference not set in UIManager");
            
            if (_skillIndicator == null)
                Debug.LogWarning("SkillIndicatorUI reference not set in UIManager");
        }

        private void Start()
        {
            // Initialize UI with player data if available
            if (_playerController != null)
            {
                InitializeUI();
            }
        }

        private void Update()
        {
            // Update UI elements each frame
            UpdateHealthBar();
            UpdateStaminaBar();
            UpdateSkillIndicators();
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Initialize UI components with player data
        /// </summary>
        private void InitializeUI()
        {
            // TODO: Initialize with actual player stats
            if (_healthBar != null)
                _healthBar.SetMaxHealth(100f);
            
            if (_staminaBar != null)
                _staminaBar.SetMaxStamina(100f);
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update health bar display
        /// </summary>
        private void UpdateHealthBar()
        {
            if (_healthBar != null && _playerController != null)
            {
                // TODO: Get actual health value from player
                // For now using placeholder value
                _healthBar.UpdateHealth(100f);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update stamina bar display
        /// </summary>
        private void UpdateStaminaBar()
        {
            if (_staminaBar != null && _playerController != null)
            {
                // TODO: Get actual stamina value from player
                // For now using placeholder value
                _staminaBar.UpdateStamina(100f);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update skill indicator displays
        /// </summary>
        private void UpdateSkillIndicators()
        {
            if (_skillIndicator != null && _playerController != null)
            {
                // TODO: Get actual skill cooldown data from player
                _skillIndicator.UpdateCooldowns(0f, 0f, 0f);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Manually set health value (can be called from other systems)
        /// </summary>
        public void SetHealth(float current, float max)
        {
            if (_healthBar != null)
            {
                _healthBar.SetMaxHealth(max);
                _healthBar.UpdateHealth(current);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Manually set stamina value (can be called from other systems)
        /// </summary>
        public void SetStamina(float current, float max)
        {
            if (_staminaBar != null)
            {
                _staminaBar.SetMaxStamina(max);
                _staminaBar.UpdateStamina(current);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update skill cooldowns (can be called from other systems)
        /// </summary>
        public void SetSkillCooldowns(float skill1, float skill2, float skill3)
        {
            if (_skillIndicator != null)
            {
                _skillIndicator.UpdateCooldowns(skill1, skill2, skill3);
            }
        }
    }
}
</content>

</write_to_file>","reasoning_details":[],"call_id":""},{"type":"tool_use","id":"toolu_01Y3TKr9LWQe4sSYLvq3j15F","name":"write_to_file","input":{"path":"Assets/_Game/Scripts/UI/HealthBarUI.cs","content":"using UnityEngine;
using UnityEngine.UI;

namespace NBC.ActionMachine.UI
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Health bar UI component
    /// Displays player health with a filled image bar
    /// </summary>
    public class HealthBarUI : MonoBehaviour
    {
        [Header("UI Components")]
        [SerializeField] private Image _fillImage;
        [SerializeField] private Text _healthText;

        [Header("Settings")]
        [SerializeField] private Color _healthyColor = Color.green;
        [SerializeField] private Color _lowHealthColor = Color.red;
        [SerializeField] private float _lowHealthThreshold = 0.3f;
        [SerializeField] private bool _smoothTransition = true;
        [SerializeField] private float _transitionSpeed = 5f;

        private float _maxHealth = 100f;
        private float _currentHealth = 100f;
        private float _targetFillAmount = 1f;

        private void Awake()
        {
            if (_fillImage == null)
                Debug.LogError("Fill Image not assigned in HealthBarUI");
        }

        private void Update()
        {
            if (_smoothTransition && _fillImage != null)
            {
                // Smooth transition to target fill amount
                _fillImage.fillAmount = Mathf.Lerp(
                    _fillImage.fillAmount, 
                    _targetFillAmount, 
                    Time.deltaTime * _transitionSpeed
                );
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Set the maximum health value
        /// </summary>
        public void SetMaxHealth(float maxHealth)
        {
            _maxHealth = maxHealth;
            UpdateHealthDisplay();
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update current health value
        /// </summary>
        public void UpdateHealth(float currentHealth)
        {
            _currentHealth = Mathf.Clamp(currentHealth, 0f, _maxHealth);
            UpdateHealthDisplay();
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update the visual display of the health bar
        /// </summary>
        private void UpdateHealthDisplay()
        {
            if (_fillImage == null) return;

            // Calculate fill amount
            _targetFillAmount = _maxHealth > 0 ? _currentHealth / _maxHealth : 0f;

            // Immediate update if smooth transition is disabled
            if (!_smoothTransition)
            {
                _fillImage.fillAmount = _targetFillAmount;
            }

            // Update color based on health percentage
            _fillImage.color = _targetFillAmount <= _lowHealthThreshold 
                ? _lowHealthColor 
                : _healthyColor;

            // Update text if available
            if (_healthText != null)
            {
                _healthText.text = $"{_currentHealth:F0} / {_maxHealth:F0}";
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Get current health percentage (0-1)
        /// </summary>
        public float GetHealthPercentage()
        {
            return _maxHealth > 0 ? _currentHealth / _maxHealth : 0f;
        }
    }
}

<final_file_content path="Assets/_Game/Scripts/UI/UIManager.cs">
using UnityEngine;
using UnityEngine.UI;

namespace NBC.ActionMachine.UI
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Main UI manager for the game HUD
    /// Manages health bar, stamina bar, and skill indicators
    /// </summary>
    public class UIManager : MonoBehaviour
    {
        [Header("UI References")]
        [SerializeField] private HealthBarUI _healthBar;
        [SerializeField] private StaminaBarUI _staminaBar;
        [SerializeField] private SkillIndicatorUI _skillIndicator;

        [Header("Player Reference")]
        [SerializeField] private ActionController _playerController;

        private void Awake()
        {
            if (_healthBar == null)
                Debug.LogWarning("HealthBarUI reference not set in UIManager");
            
            if (_staminaBar == null)
                Debug.LogWarning("StaminaBarUI reference not set in UIManager");
            
            if (_skillIndicator == null)
                Debug.LogWarning("SkillIndicatorUI reference not set in UIManager");
        }

        private void Start()
        {
            // Initialize UI with player data if available
            if (_playerController != null)
            {
                InitializeUI();
            }
        }

        private void Update()
        {
            // Update UI elements each frame
            UpdateHealthBar();
            UpdateStaminaBar();
            UpdateSkillIndicators();
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Initialize UI components with player data
        /// </summary>
        private void InitializeUI()
        {
            // TODO: Initialize with actual player stats
            if (_healthBar != null)
                _healthBar.SetMaxHealth(100f);
            
            if (_staminaBar != null)
                _staminaBar.SetMaxStamina(100f);
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update health bar display
        /// </summary>
        private void UpdateHealthBar()
        {
            if (_healthBar != null && _playerController != null)
            {
                // TODO: Get actual health value from player
                // For now using placeholder value
                _healthBar.UpdateHealth(100f);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update stamina bar display
        /// </summary>
        private void UpdateStaminaBar()
        {
            if (_staminaBar != null && _playerController != null)
            {
                // TODO: Get actual stamina value from player
                // For now using placeholder value
                _staminaBar.UpdateStamina(100f);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update skill indicator displays
        /// </summary>
        private void UpdateSkillIndicators()
        {
            if (_skillIndicator != null && _playerController != null)
            {
                // TODO: Get actual skill cooldown data from player
                _skillIndicator.UpdateCooldowns(0f, 0f, 0f);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Manually set health value (can be called from other systems)
        /// </summary>
        public void SetHealth(float current, float max)
        {
            if (_healthBar != null)
            {
                _healthBar.SetMaxHealth(max);
                _healthBar.UpdateHealth(current);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Manually set stamina value (can be called from other systems)
        /// </summary>
        public void SetStamina(float current, float max)
        {
            if (_staminaBar != null)
            {
                _staminaBar.SetMaxStamina(max);
                _staminaBar.UpdateStamina(current);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update skill cooldowns (can be called from other systems)
        /// </summary>
        public void SetSkillCooldowns(float skill1, float skill2, float skill3)
        {
            if (_skillIndicator != null)
            {
                _skillIndicator.UpdateCooldowns(skill1, skill2, skill3);
            }
        }
    }
}

</final_file_content>

<path>Assets/_Game/Scripts/UI/HealthBarUI.cs</path>
<content>using UnityEngine;
using UnityEngine.UI;

namespace NBC.ActionMachine.UI
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Health bar UI component
    /// Displays player health with a filled image bar
    /// </summary>
    public class HealthBarUI : MonoBehaviour
    {
        [Header("UI Components")]
        [SerializeField] private Image _fillImage;
        [SerializeField] private Text _healthText;

        [Header("Settings")]
        [SerializeField] private Color _healthyColor = Color.green;
        [SerializeField] private Color _lowHealthColor = Color.red;
        [SerializeField] private float _lowHealthThreshold = 0.3f;
        [SerializeField] private bool _smoothTransition = true;
        [SerializeField] private float _transitionSpeed = 5f;

        private float _maxHealth = 100f;
        private float _currentHealth = 100f;
        private float _targetFillAmount = 1f;

        private void Awake()
        {
            if (_fillImage == null)
                Debug.LogError("Fill Image not assigned in HealthBarUI");
        }

        private void Update()
        {
            if (_smoothTransition && _fillImage != null)
            {
                // Smooth transition to target fill amount
                _fillImage.fillAmount = Mathf.Lerp(
                    _fillImage.fillAmount, 
                    _targetFillAmount, 
                    Time.deltaTime * _transitionSpeed
                );
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Set the maximum health value
        /// </summary>
        public void SetMaxHealth(float maxHealth)
        {
            _maxHealth = maxHealth;
            UpdateHealthDisplay();
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update current health value
        /// </summary>
        public void UpdateHealth(float currentHealth)
        {
            _currentHealth = Mathf.Clamp(currentHealth, 0f, _maxHealth);
            UpdateHealthDisplay();
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update the visual display of the health bar
        /// </summary>
        private void UpdateHealthDisplay()
        {
            if (_fillImage == null) return;

            // Calculate fill amount
            _targetFillAmount = _maxHealth > 0 ? _currentHealth / _maxHealth : 0f;

            // Immediate update if smooth transition is disabled
            if (!_smoothTransition)
            {
                _fillImage.fillAmount = _targetFillAmount;
            }

            // Update color based on health percentage
            _fillImage.color = _targetFillAmount <= _lowHealthThreshold 
                ? _lowHealthColor 
                : _healthyColor;

            // Update text if available
            if (_healthText != null)
            {
                _healthText.text = $"{_currentHealth:F0} / {_maxHealth:F0}";
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Get current health percentage (0-1)
        /// </summary>
        public float GetHealthPercentage()
        {
            return _maxHealth > 0 ? _currentHealth / _maxHealth : 0f;
        }
    }
}
</content>

<final_file_content path="Assets/_Game/Scripts/UI/HealthBarUI.cs">
using UnityEngine;
using UnityEngine.UI;

namespace NBC.ActionMachine.UI
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Health bar UI component
    /// Displays player health with a filled image bar
    /// </summary>
    public class HealthBarUI : MonoBehaviour
    {
        [Header("UI Components")]
        [SerializeField] private Image _fillImage;
        [SerializeField] private Text _healthText;

        [Header("Settings")]
        [SerializeField] private Color _healthyColor = Color.green;
        [SerializeField] private Color _lowHealthColor = Color.red;
        [SerializeField] private float _lowHealthThreshold = 0.3f;
        [SerializeField] private bool _smoothTransition = true;
        [SerializeField] private float _transitionSpeed = 5f;

        private float _maxHealth = 100f;
        private float _currentHealth = 100f;
        private float _targetFillAmount = 1f;

        private void Awake()
        {
            if (_fillImage == null)
                Debug.LogError("Fill Image not assigned in HealthBarUI");
        }

        private void Update()
        {
            if (_smoothTransition && _fillImage != null)
            {
                // Smooth transition to target fill amount
                _fillImage.fillAmount = Mathf.Lerp(
                    _fillImage.fillAmount, 
                    _targetFillAmount, 
                    Time.deltaTime * _transitionSpeed
                );
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Set the maximum health value
        /// </summary>
        public void SetMaxHealth(float maxHealth)
        {
            _maxHealth = maxHealth;
            UpdateHealthDisplay();
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update current health value
        /// </summary>
        public void UpdateHealth(float currentHealth)
        {
            _currentHealth = Mathf.Clamp(currentHealth, 0f, _maxHealth);
            UpdateHealthDisplay();
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Update the visual display of the health bar
        /// </summary>
        private void UpdateHealthDisplay()
        {
            if (_fillImage == null) return;

            // Calculate fill amount
            _targetFillAmount = _maxHealth > 0 ? _currentHealth / _maxHealth : 0f;

            // Immediate update if smooth transition is disabled
            if (!_smoothTransition)
            {
                _fillImage.fillAmount = _targetFillAmount;
            }

            // Update color based on health percentage
            _fillImage.color = _targetFillAmount <= _lowHealthThreshold 
                ? _lowHealthColor 
                : _healthyColor;

            // Update text if available
            if (_healthText != null)
            {
                _healthText.text = $"{_currentHealth:F0} / {_maxHealth:F0}";
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Get current health percentage (0-1)
        /// </summary>
        public float GetHealthPercentage()
        {
            return _maxHealth > 0 ? _currentHealth / _maxHealth : 0f;
        }
    }
}

</final_file_content>
